Content.Text:
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just dusting some of my shelves.
<PAGE>
If I don't take the time to clean regularly,
everything will be covered in dust before I know
it. I just wish dusting weren't such a chore...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Oh, I know! If you have a little time to spare,
how would you like to join me in a little game?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a simple test of your judgment.
<PAGE>
There are two old photographs on this shelf. Can
you guess which of the two is more valuable?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>Correct! So you are a good judge of taste, then.
I'm proud of you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I'm certain the photograph is also glad that you
had good enough sense to pick it out.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>You know, perhaps this is fate. Discovering this
photograph today could mean that you're meant
to take it home!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What do you say? It's a mere 1,000,000G. A
steal, at that price!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. I'm just kidding! You're awfully adorable
when you panic like that.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This has been a very pleasant little diversion for
me. Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm glad you decided to join me today.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, then, I must get back to my cleaning!
<PAGE>
Please come again sometime. I'll have a more
difficult, more interesting puzzle waiting to
challenge you!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hope this little game has helped raise your
interest in antiques, though!
<PAGE>
If we had a topic of common interest to chat
about, I believe we could spend some truly
quality time together.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, then, I must get back to my cleaning.
<PAGE>
Thank you for joining me in my little game,
<MYNAME>! Please have a lovely day.
